credit_line: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
title: Sidewall
description: Pillar and arch design, featuring a memorial to George Washington. A bust of George is centered on a pyramid upon a pedestal. Trophies of war sit upon the plinthm, including cannon cannon balls, drum, and flag. The pedestal sits between two columns. To the left are floral vines forming a pointed arch.
name: Sidewall
